snippet: The end of smartphone patent lawsuits is by no means near, but legal experts say an F.T.C. settlement signals progress in clarifying the rules in high-tech patent battles, and thus could ease them.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission hails patent settlement with Google as 'landmark enforcement action' that will apply to huge high-tech markets like smartphones and tablet computers; move could ease recent spat of high-profile patent suits in those industries.
lead_paragraph: The end of smartphone patent lawsuits is by no means near, but legal experts say an F.T.C. settlement signals progress in clarifying the rules in high-tech patent battles, and thus could ease them.

headline.seo: In Google Patent Case, F.T.C. Set Rules of Engagement for Battles
headline.main: On Google, F.T.C. Set Rules of War Over Patents
headline.print_headline: On Google, F.T.C. Set Rules of War Over Patents
